title: Pim van Helvoirt - About me
topcontent:
I am Pim van Helvoirt. At the moment I've just finished my bachelor BÃ¨ta-gamma with a major in Artificial Intelligence at the university of Amsterdam. As of right now I am looking for a job. 

During my studies I've been active in the student participation. In the past I was, for example, [chair of the Central Student Council (article in Dutch)](https://www.folia.nl/actueel/112180/betagamma-student-pim-van-helvoirt-nieuwe-voorzitter-studentenraad).
